questions.text: How many new patients do you typically get per month?
questions.description: This helps us understand your practice growth and capacity

questions.text: What's your biggest challenge in patient communication?
questions.description: Identifying communication pain points helps optimize your workflow

questions.text: How do you currently handle appointment confirmations?
questions.description: Understanding your current process helps identify automation opportunities

questions.text: What percentage of patients miss appointments without notice?
questions.description: No-shows directly impact revenue and scheduling efficiency

questions.text: Which services generate the most revenue for your practice?
questions.description: This helps us focus on optimizing your most profitable areas

questions.text: What would save you the most time in daily operations?
questions.description: Your answer helps us prioritize the most impactful improvements
